Regulation Name(s): Lipase hydrolysis/glycerol kinase enzyme triglycerides test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alfa Wassermann S-Test CHO, HDL, and TG reagent cartridges for quantitative determination of cholesterol, HDL, and triglycerides using S40 Clinical Analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative determination of cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, and triglyceride concentrations in serum or heparin plasma using the S40 Clinical Analyzer; used to aid diagnosis and treatment of lipid metabolism disorders, atherosclerosis, diabetes, liver and renal diseases, and other endocrine disorders; for in vitro diagnostic use in clinical and physician office laboratories.
